headings.usage: Hero titles, Section headers, Product names (Large)

body.usage: Descriptions, UI elements, Buttons, Price tags

usage_rules: Primary background must be pure White (#FFFFFF).
Text must be Deep Black (#09090B) for maximum contrast.
Use very light gray (#F9FAFB) for subtle section differentiation.
No gradients. Use solid colors and texture.
Buttons: Solid Black with White text. Sharp corners or pill-shaped.

layout.grid_system: Grid Mode A (Tetris/Masonry) for Product Listing. Asymmetrical.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 h-12 px-8 rounded-full text-sm uppercase tracking-widest font-semibold transition-transform active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 h-12 px-8 rounded-full text-sm uppercase tracking-widest font-medium
buttons.outline: border border-input bg-background hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground h-12 px-8 rounded-full text-sm uppercase tracking-widest

cards.product: group relative flex flex-col gap-4 bg-transparent border-none shadow-none
cards.product_image_inner: object-cover w-full h-full transition-transform duration-700 group-hover:scale-105

inputs.default: flex h-12 w-full rounded-none border-b border-input bg-transparent px-3 py-1 text-sm shadow-sm transition-colors file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:border-primary disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

assets.icons: Use 'lucide-react' with thin stroke width (1.5px) for elegance.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add '@fontsource/playfair-display' and '@fontsource/manrope' to package.json and import in index.js.
2. TAILWIND CONFIG: Update tailwind.config.js to include the new font families and color palette.
3. LAYOUT: Implement the 'Masonry' grid for the product listing. Do not use a simple equal-height grid. Allow images to have their natural aspect ratio or force 3:4.
4. COMPONENTS: Use Shadcn UI for interactive elements (Cart sheet, Dialogs) but style them to match the 'Swiss Minimal' aesthetic (sharp edges, black/white).
5. MOCK API: Create a simple mock API function that returns the product list defined in 'assets.images.products'.
6. CART STATE: Use React Context or Zustand for global cart state management.
7. MICRO-INTERACTIONS: Add hover effects to product cards (image zoom) and buttons (scale/color shift).
8. DATA-TESTID: Ensure all interactive elements have 'data-testid' attributes.
